content: jumbo felted tote size approx 12 deep x 20 wide after felting materials note do not use white off-white or superwash-treated wool as it will not felt 125 yds each of 10 colors of bulky weight 100% wool or wool/mohair blend that felts easily a double-strand of worsted weight 100% wool may be substituted sample shown in brown sheep lamb s pride bulky with double-strand of plymouth yarns outback wool used for multicolor row size n/15 10 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge 8 double_crochet = 4 4 row double_crochet = 4 with size n/15 10 mm hook before felting method bag is worked in rounds from bottom to top working from both sides of starting chain to form seamless tube stitches/terms beginning beg chain chain decrease decrease
